IX.iii.1.D.5.a
.
Sources of Income
Under
38 CFR 3.262(h)
, a Parents’ DIC claimant may waive all or part of retirement received from the following sources without counting the amount for Parents’ DIC purposes:
Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund
RRB
District of Columbia firemen, policemen, or public school teachers, and
Former United States Lighthouse Service.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D - Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Authorization
